Actions.Name: When a rule is fired
Actions.Description: Create an action which triggers when a rule is fired in IoT Central.

Actions.Name: Run a command
Actions.Description: Run a command by ID on a device.

Actions.Name: Create a device
Actions.Description: Create a new real or simulated device of a specified device template.

Actions.Name: Get a device
Actions.Description: Get details about an existing device by device ID.

Actions.Name: Delete a device
Actions.Description: Delete an existing device by device ID.

Actions.Name: Update a device
Actions.Description: Update an existing device by device ID.
